particle: pin | ls: r[cid,  pin] := *particle{cid}, not *pin{cid: cid, type}, pin=0
?[pinned, cid, mime, text, size] := r[cid, pinned], *particle{cid:cid, mime, text, size}
particle: filter: ?[cid, text] := *particle{cid, mime, text, blocks, size, sizeLocal, type}, mime="text/plain"
link: text-to-text: ?[text_from, text_to]  := rt[text_from, from] , rf[text_to, to], text_from != '', text_to != ''
transactions: ls | trim: ?[type, v_trim, t] := *transaction{type, value, timestamp}, v_trim = from_substrings(slice(chars(dump_json(value)),0, 100)),  t = format_timestamp(timestamp/1000)
transactions: parse | delegate: ?[a, d, timestamp] := *transaction{type, value, timestamp}, type = 'cosmos.staking.v1beta1.MsgDelegate', a_ = get(value,'amount'), a = get(a_, 'amount'), d = get(a_, 'denom')
transactions: parse | link: ?[from, to, t] := *transaction{type, value, timestamp}, type = 'cyber.graph.v1beta1.MsgCyberlink', links = get(value, 'links'), l_ = get(links, 0), from =get(l_,'from'), to =get(l_,'to'), t = format_timestamp(timestamp/1000)
